Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/topTables-methods.R
topTables.Rd

Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

topTables(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysis
topTables(object, results, lfcShrink = TRUE,
  n = 50L)

# S4 method for DESeqResults
topTables(object, n = 50L)

# S4 method for DESeqResultsTables
topTables(object, n = 50L)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
results

scalar. Position or name of DESeqResults.
lfcShrink

boolean. Use shrunken log2 fold change (LFC) values.
n

scalar integer. Number of genes (per direction) to report.

Value

kable.

See also

Other R Markdown Functions: prepareRNASeqTemplate

Examples

# DESeqAnalysis ====
topTables(deseq_small, results = 1L, n = 5L)
#> DESeqResults: treatment folic acid vs control (shrunken LFC)
#> 
#> 
#> |                   |geneName |geneBiotype    | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |description                           |
#> |:------------------|:--------|:--------------|--------:|:----|:---------|:-------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000024164 |C3       |protein_coding |    12578|8.70 |4.32e-193 |complement component 3                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |Spp1     |protein_coding |    69411|5.65 |3.47e-76  |secreted phosphoprotein 1             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |Cp       |protein_coding |     3563|4.28 |3.54e-45  |ceruloplasmin                         |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |Clu      |protein_coding |     3547|3.70 |1.88e-42  |clusterin                             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |Havcr1   |protein_coding |     3004|3.92 |9.93e-38  |hepatitis A virus cellular receptor 1 |
#> 
#> 
#> |                   |geneName |geneBiotype    | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |description                                                        |
#> |:------------------|:--------|:--------------|--------:|:-----|:--------|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000027199 |Gatm     |protein_coding |    11590|-2.39 |1.37e-12 |glycine amidinotransferase (L-arginine:glycine amidinotransferase) |
#> |ENSMUSG00000005980 |Dnase1   |protein_coding |     5779|-2.89 |1.71e-12 |deoxyribonuclease I                                                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000049152 |Ugt3a2   |protein_coding |    13854|-1.74 |1.02e-10 |UDP glycosyltransferases 3 family, polypeptide A2                  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |Cyp4b1   |protein_coding |    14769|-1.67 |2.28e-10 |cytochrome P450, family 4, subfamily b, polypeptide 1              |
#> |ENSMUSG00000061906 |Ugt2b38  |protein_coding |     7395|-2.02 |1.03e-09 |UDP glucuronosyltransferase 2 family, polypeptide B38              |
